testcase.name: Book mentor
testcase.system-out: Given I open site codersguru................................................passed When I click on register new user...........................................passed And I register private user with "@kordecki.pl" "Krzysztof" "Kordecki" "pass1!@#" "Wroclaw" "52-129" "Kielbasnicza" "28".passed Then User should be successfully registered.................................passed When I select "GIT".........................................................passed And I select mentor 3.......................................................passed And I select first date and hour possible with message "I need help!".......passed Then I'm redirected to PayU site............................................passed When I enter fake credit card details.......................................passed Then Payment is refused.....................................................passed

testcase.name: Register company user
